fullEmployees.name: Zachary Dupree
fullEmployees.description: Zack is a Computer Science student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University. Zack enjoys coding projects that make life easier and simpler. Zack also likes hiking and photography.

fullEmployees.name: Ryan Dodd
fullEmployees.description: Ryan is a Computer Science student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University, who loves programming. Ryan has experience developing in multiple areas, particularly with web and augmented reality. In his free time, Ryan enjoys rock climbing, reading, and creating new ideas.

fullEmployees.name: Duncan Carr
fullEmployees.description: Duncan is a Mathematics student and Resident Advisor at Bradley University, with a hobby for programming. Duncan has experience with a variety of computer science topics, dabbling in whatever interests him at a given time. Duncan enjoys learning new things, cooking, and spending time with friends.

fullEmployees.name: Daniel Thornley
fullEmployees.description: Daniel is a Computer Science student at Bradley University. Daniel enjoys coding, and has primarily worked on personal projects.

fullEmployees.name: Alexander Talbott
fullEmployees.description: Alexander is a UX designer, dedicated to ensuring the best possible experience for all users. Alexander studied at Bradley University and has traveled the globe working for clients, making digital and physical products that put user needs first.

fullEmployees.name: JD de Beauvoir
fullEmployees.description: JD is a 2nd year Computer Science and Music student at Bradley University. JD has experience with all kinds of software development, from full stack websites to Minecraft mods. JD also plays the violin, and does gigs in his free time.

negativeTestimonials.name: Jackson S
negativeTestimonials.description: I have to log in five times just to navigate our portal

negativeTestimonials.name: Josh M
negativeTestimonials.description: Our supervisors don't even know how to use our current software

negativeTestimonials.name: Katie W
negativeTestimonials.description: A new system could speed up my daily activities

negativeTestimonials.name: Suzen M
negativeTestimonials.description: I spend countless hours helping my students find the resources most relevant to them.

negativeTestimonials.name: Riley T
negativeTestimonials.description: Our current student app is just a website crammed into an app

negativeTestimonials.name: Alex L
negativeTestimonials.description: ...it's so bad I've given up on finding classes

negativeTestimonials.name: Caleb N
negativeTestimonials.description: It's a poorly designed app ripped straight off the school's website that isn't user friendly whatsoever

negativeTestimonials.name: Morgan K
negativeTestimonials.description: The website is very cluttered and it can be hard to find what I need at times
